article_title: What the last 10 days in America looked like to the rest of the world

article_metadata.description: The U.S. has given the rest of the world a lot to chew on in recent days.The Supreme Court rulings on gay marriage and Obamacare. The Charleston massacre. Trans-Pacific Partnership.

og.description: It’s good to be reminded sometimes what the U.S. might look like to people in Asia, Africa and the Middle East — or even Canada and Britain.
og.title: What the last 10 days in America looked like to the rest of the world
